1.0.1.en: Added Homey Community Forum topic ID to the app manifest

1.0.2.en: Small fix and increase polling time

1.1.7.en: Added an option to easily send the configurations privately

1.2.0.en: Add support for the Whisper Flex

1.2.2.en: Bugfix: fix horizontal oscillation for the Whisper Flex and added new type ID to the Threesixty

1.2.4.en: Make sure no decimals are displayed in the fan speed slider

1.2.6.en: Added set capability options for threesixty

1.3.1.en: Fix Eco mode on Edge heater

1.3.2.en: Added tank full alarm and Flow cards for Bora

1.3.3.en: Add new icons for the Threesixty and the Whisper Flex

1.3.4.en: Fixed the icons for the Bora and the Edge on mobile

2.0.0.en: Big update: Added Beam, Added Beam Mini, Added Neo, Added North 9k, Added North 12k, Added North 14k, Added North 18k, Added fault detection for the Bora, Fixed Flow cards for the Whisper Flex

2.1.2.en: Added support for the older Bora (DXDH02)

2.1.4.en: Added another type ID for the Edge heater and fixed a typo in the app  Settings page (Dutch language)

2.1.8.en: Fix Whisper Flex Ultimate fan speed capability

2.2.0.en: Added support for the Edge Oil

2.3.1.en: Fixed the type ID for the Bright

2.4.0.en: Added support for authorizing via the link in the Duux emails
